statements.sql: select count(*) as aggregate from `products` inner join `categoryables` on `products`.`id` = `categoryables`.`categoryable_id` left join `attribute_product` on `products`.`id` = `attribute_product`.`product_id` where `categoryables`.`categoryable_type` = 'App\Model\Common\Product' and `products`.`regular_price` between '150' and '2550' and `attribute_product`.`color_id` in ('9', '10') group by `products`.`id`

select `products`.* from `products` inner join `categoryables` on `products`.`id` = `categoryables`.`categoryable_id` left join `attribute_product` on `products`.`id` = `attribute_product`.`product_id` where `categoryables`.`categoryable_type` = 'App\Model\Common\Product' and `products`.`regular_price` between '150' and '2550' and `attribute_product`.`color_id` in ('9', '10') group by `products`.`id` order by `products`.`regular_price` desc limit 15 offset 0
